mapper.select: select power_id, power_login, power_update, power_detele, position_id, employee_detail_status from power
mapper.insert: insert into power(power_login, power_update, power_detele, position_id, employee_detail_status) values (#{powerLogin}, #{powerUpdate}, #{powerDetele}, #{positionId}, #{employeeDetailStatus})
mapper.update:
update power
power_login = #{powerLogin},
power_update = #{powerUpdate},
power_detele = #{powerDetele},

employee_detail_status = #{employeeDetailStatus},
where power_id = #{powerId}
